name: Barriers and Enablers to Learning Maths
content: We have an exciting programme for educators, academics and researchers including key note talks on statistical literacy, e-learning, maths learning difficulties and (add others), working sessions and maths educational films as well as parallel sessions in the four tracks of motivation and maths anxiety, inclusive practice, effective practice and learning technology. We are also still accepting a few high quality paper, workshop and presentation abstracts, and proposals for maths educational films. They can be submitted to education-mathsenablers@glasgow.ac.uk<mailto:education-mathsenablers@glasgow.ac.uk>
